forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, with winds diminishing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
